snippet: The group claimed responsibility for a suicide car bombing last weekend that killed at least 25 people, calling it a warning to the United States to stop meddling in Yemen’s affairs.
abstract: Branch of Al Qaeda in Yemen claims responsibility for a suicide car bombing in southern Yemen that killed at least 25 people; says attack was a warning to the United States to stop meddling in Yemen’s affairs.
lead_paragraph: The group claimed responsibility for a suicide car bombing last weekend that killed at least 25 people, calling it a warning to the United States to stop meddling in Yemen’s affairs.

headline.main: Yemen: Al Qaeda Says It Planned Suicide Bombing in Country’s South
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Al Qaeda Says It Planned Suicide Bombing in Country’s South
